column5: the General Department of Immigration transferred 91 Chinese nationals including 21 women involved in VOIP internet scamming.------Lieutenant General Ouk Hai Seila
column6: director of the Department of Investigation and Compliance Procedure of the General Department of Immigration
column7: handed the offenders to Chinese police to take them away for prosecution in China.------ ------China’s Guangzhou provincial police have so far accounted for 182 wanted people. ------The suspects were sent back to China on a special plane A330 (Flight CZ3001 / CZ3002)------Source BTV
